8: 1 We went to the cinema together twice a week. (How often?)
1 How often did we go to the cinema together?
2 She is at the cinema. (Where?)
2 Where is she?
3 The film was very interesting. (What?)
3 What was very interesting?
4 My sister will write a letter tomorrow. (Who?)
4 Who will write a letter tomorrow?
5 He was in Paris last year. (When?)
5 When was he in Paris?
6 We invited many friends. (How many?)
6 How many friends did we invite?
7 This is my house. (Whose?)
7 Whose house is this?
8 She likes to drink coffee. (What?)
8 What does she like to drink?
9 We often went to London last year. (Where?)
9 Where did we often go last year?
10 My brother wants to go to bed earlier today. (Who?)
10 Who wants to go to bed earlier today?
11 He will be at home after five. (When?)
11 When will he be at home?
12 They are good friends. (Who?)
12 Who are good friends?
